name: Pdf417MacroAssembler
summary: Collects Macro PDF417 segments and assembles the original payload when complete.

methods.name: TryAdd
methods.summary: Attempts to add a decoded Macro PDF417 segment.

methods.name: TryAdd
methods.summary: Attempts to add a decoded Macro PDF417 segment from a wrapper.

methods.name: TryAdd
methods.summary: Attempts to add a Macro PDF417 segment with explicit metadata.

methods.name: Add
methods.summary: Adds a decoded Macro PDF417 segment.

methods.name: Add
methods.summary: Adds a decoded Macro PDF417 segment from a wrapper.

methods.name: TryAssemble
methods.summary: Attempts to assemble the full payload when all segments are present.

methods.name: Assemble
methods.summary: Assembles the full payload when all segments are present.

properties.name: FileId
properties.summary: Gets the Macro PDF417 file identifier when known.

properties.name: SegmentCount
properties.summary: Gets the expected segment count when present in metadata.

properties.name: HasLastSegment
properties.summary: Gets whether a segment flagged as the last segment was received.

properties.name: LastSegmentIndex
properties.summary: Gets the index of the last segment when known.

properties.name: ReceivedCount
properties.summary: Gets the number of segments collected.

properties.name: FileName
properties.summary: Gets the file name when present.

properties.name: FileSize
properties.summary: Gets the file size when present.

properties.name: IsComplete
properties.summary: Gets whether all expected segments have been collected.
